attributes.action: Put pressure on China to conform to the Human Rights acts and to stop torturing of people in China, especially Chinese prisons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: China has flouted Human Rights laws and still continues to torture people inside and outside of their prisons. Most people in the prisons are Tibetans that have been put there for no other reason than having a photograph of the Dalai Lama, their spiritual leader, or voicing their opinions in a non-violent way about the Chinese occupation of Tibet. We urge the Prime Minister to take action and make people aware of the situation in China.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
